## SummonerManager.fetchByAccount() method

Fetch a summoner by a RIOT account associated to it.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fetchByAccount(account: Account, options?: {
        force: boolean;
    }): Promise<Summoner>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  account | [Account](./shieldbow.account.md) | The associated RIOT account. |
|  options | { force: boolean; } | <i>(Optional)</i> The basic fetching options. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Summoner](./shieldbow.summoner.md)<!-- -->&gt;
